name: Realistic human rendering in Nvidia Omniverse
short_description: Talk from **NVidia** covering realistic human rendering in **NVidia Omniverse**
full_description:
Talk from **NVidia** covering realistic human rendering in **NVidia Omniverse**

# **Facial Reconstruction**
They talk in-depth about scanning a single model and doing everything in their power to make a 3D reconstruction and reailstic renders of that virtual human.
## Data acquisition
20 views, with different, 8 of them with polarized illuminations, others with constant
Captures of 60 expressions
In the end, 8400 photos, 180Gb of data

## Raw sensor data processing
### Demosaicing
!**Pasted image 20230307114001.png**
Cameras capture images with sensors, each capturing the strength of a single color. Then, a filter is used to process these raw sensor outputs. That process is called **Demosaicing**. This team improved the **Aliasing Minimization and Zipper Elimination** algorithm.
### Radiometric calibration
!**Pasted image 20230307114512.png**
Angle-dependent sensitivity of light, lens specifics, etc. can contribute to pixel position-dependent varying colors.

name: FaceIt Blender Plugin
short_description: # Documentation overview
full_description:
# Documentation overview
Most of FaceIt's documentation is related to how to use their character creation tool (rig the face, make sure expressions work correctly, etc.)

## Audio2Face
FaceIt documentation has a page describing **NVidia Audio2Face** which works using **FACS**
And, of course, they descibe how to import those facial animations from NVidia

name: Panotour Pro
short_description: Panotour Pro is a tool for creating virtual tours
full_description:
Panotour Pro is a tool for creating virtual tours
Basically, combining **Panoramic Image**s into a graph for exploration
Many snapshots from a **360 Camera** can be linked through this software to create a full-on vitual tour.
